title: What are some songs about video recording? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hmmm, the first song that comes to mind is “Make a Circuit With Me”, by the Polecats. Not entirely about video recording, but it’s mixed in there…and it’s on my workout mix for some strange reason. Second is “Kino”, by Cabaret Voltaire. The third is “30 Frames a Second”, by Simple Minds. A very good song too… I’m showing my (rapidly advancing) age…
